statements: SELECT volunteer_id, date, hours_worked, task_description FROM VolunteerHours;
SELECT * FROM VolunteerHours WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT task_description, date, volunteer_id, hours_worked FROM VolunteerHours WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT volunteer_id, task_description FROM VolunteerHours ORDER BY date DESC, hours_worked ASC;
SELECT task_description FROM VolunteerHours WHERE task_description LIKE '%admin%' ORDER BY task_description ASC;
SELECT * FROM VolunteerHours WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT volunteer_id, date FROM VolunteerHours WHERE hours_worked >= 5;
SELECT task_description, hours_worked FROM VolunteerHours ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM VolunteerHours WHERE task_description LIKE '%clean%';
SELECT AVG(hours_worked) AS avg_hours_worked FROM VolunteerHours WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Volunteer;
SELECT volunteer_name, hours_worked FROM Volunteer;
SELECT volunteer_id, volunteer_name FROM Volunteer ORDER BY volunteer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Volunteer WHERE hours_worked > 10;
SELECT volunteer_name, hours_worked FROM Volunteer WHERE volunteer_id = 5;
SELECT volunteer_id, volunteer_name FROM Volunteer WHERE hours_worked > 10;
SELECT * FROM Volunteer WHERE volunteer_id IN (SELECT volunteer_id FROM VolunteerReport WHERE hours_contributed > 20);
SELECT volunteer_id, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked FROM Volunteer GROUP BY volunteer_id;
SELECT volunteer_id, volunteer_name, hours_worked FROM Volunteer ORDER BY hours_worked DESC;
SELECT volunteer_id, volunteer_name, hours_worked FROM Volunteer ORDER BY volunteer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM VolunteerHours;
SELECT date, hours_worked FROM VolunteerHours ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT event_name, location FROM VolunteerEvents WHERE organizer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT report_id, total_hours_contributed FROM VolunteerReports WHERE total_hours_contributed > 10;
SELECT volunteer_id, report_date FROM VolunteerReports WHERE volunteer_id = '98765432-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT * FROM VolunteerHours WHERE hours_worked > 5
SELECT event_name, location FROM VolunteerEvents WHERE organizer_id='123456789'
SELECT volunteer_id, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours FROM VolunteerHours GROUP BY volunteer_id
SELECT * FROM VolunteerHours JOIN VolunteerReports ON VolunteerHours.volunteer_id = VolunteerReports.volunteer_id
SELECT event_name, location, total_hours_contributed FROM VolunteerEvents JOIN VolunteerReports ON VolunteerEvents.organizer_id = VolunteerReports.volunteer_id
SELECT volunteer_id, volunteer_name FROM volunteers;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT volunteer_name, hours_worked FROM volunteers ORDER BY hours_worked DESC;
SELECT volunteer_id, project_id, hours_worked FROM volunteer_hours WHERE hours_worked > 10;
SELECT volunteer_name, total_hours_worked, report_date FROM volunteers JOIN reports ON volunteers.volunteer_id = reports.volunteer_id;
SELECT * FROM volunteers
SELECT volunteer_name, hours_worked FROM volunteers WHERE hours_worked > 10
SELECT volunteer_id, volunteer_name, hours_worked FROM volunteers ORDER BY hours_worked DESC
SELECT v.volunteer_name, p.project_name, vh.hours_worked FROM volunteers v JOIN volunteer_hours vh ON v.volunteer_id = vh.volunteer_id JOIN projects p ON p.project_id = vh.project_id
SELECT v.volunteer_name, r.total_hours_worked, r.report_date FROM volunteers v JOIN reports r ON v.volunteer_id = r.volunteer_id ORDER BY r.report_date ASC
SELECT * FROM volunteers;
SELECT name, hours_worked FROM volunteers WHERE hours_worked > 40;
SELECT volunteer_id, date_worked FROM volunteers ORDER BY date_worked DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT org_name FROM organizations;
SELECT v.name, p.project_name FROM volunteers v JOIN volunteer_projects vp ON v.volunteer_id = vp.volunteer_id JOIN projects p ON vp.project_id = p.project_id;
SELECT r.report_id, v.name, p.project_name, r.total_hours FROM reports r JOIN volunteers v ON r.volunteer_id = v.volunteer_id JOIN projects p ON r.project_id = p.project_id;
SELECT o.org_name, COUNT(vp.volunteer_id) AS total_volunteers FROM organizations o LEFT JOIN volunteer_projects vp ON o.org_id = vp.project_id GROUP BY o.org_name;
SELECT v.name, SUM(vp.hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked FROM volunteers v JOIN volunteer_projects vp ON v.volunteer_id = vp.volunteer_id GROUP BY v.name HAVING total_hours_worked > 20;

SELECT r.report_date, r.total_hours, v.name, p.project_name FROM reports r JOIN volunteers v ON r.volunteer_id = v.volunteer_id JOIN projects p ON r.project_id = p.project_id WHERE r.total_hours > 10 ORDER BY r.report_date DESC;
